00035 // class-member callback
00036 void SampleControl::process_simulation() {
00037     glClearColor(0., 0., 0., 0.);
00038     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
00039 
00040     glPushMatrix();
00041     glTranslated(sin((double)clock()/CLOCKS_PER_SEC), cos((double)clock()/CLOCKS_PER_SEC), 0.);
00042     glutSolidSphere(0.1, 20, 20);
00043     glPopMatrix();
00044 
00045     glFlush();
00046     glutPostRedisplay();
00047 }

00053     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
